message.content:
1. A 100-mm visual analogue scale (VAS) was used as an outcome measure.
2. Knee injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score (KOOS) was used as an outcome measure.
3. Range of motion (ROM) was evaluated as an outcome measure.

messages.content:
Statement: A 100-mm visual analogue scale (VAS), Knee injury and Osteoarthritis Outcome Score (KOOS) and range of motoin (ROM) were evaluated as the outcome measures.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
